Uses of Interface
cells.Cell

  • Packages that use Cell 
    Package Description
    cells
    cells package defines all the different types of cells of the game.
    gameStructure
    gameStructure package defines the main structure of the game.

    • Uses of Cell in cells

      Classes in cells that implement Cell 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GooseCell
      Class which initializes a GooseCell, when a player reaches a GooseCell, he doubles his dice throw.
      class  NormalCell
      Class which defines the "normal" cells of the Game, a NormalCell has a classic behavior.
      class  StartingCell
      Class which defines the starting cell of a game, the starting cell has 0 for index, and it is where all the players start the game.
      class  TeleportCell
      Class which defines the TeleportCell of the Game, when a TeleportCell is reached it sends a player to another cell.
      class  TrapCell
      Class which defines the TrapCell of the game, when a player is in a TrapCell, he is stuck in it until another player reaches this cell.
      class  WaitingCell
      Class which defines the WaitingCell of the Game, when a player reaches a WaitingCell, he has to wait for a define number of rounds, or he can leave the cell if another player replaces him.

    • Uses of Cell in gameStructure

      Methods in gameStructure that return Cell 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cell Game.computeTargetCell(Cell targetCell, int dice)
      Returns the cell really reached by the move.
      Cell Player.getCurrentCell()
      Gives the current cell of the player
      Methods in gameStructure with parameters of type Cell 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cell Game.computeTargetCell(Cell targetCell, int dice)
      Returns the cell really reached by the move.
      void Game.displayTrace(Cell previousCell, Cell targetCell, Cell realCell, int dice)
      Displays the trace for the GooseCells, TeleportCells and NormalCells.
      void Game.movePlayer(Cell realCell)
      It moves a player in the cell he has to be, if there is another player in this cell, it swaps the two players
      void Player.setCurrentCell(Cell currentCell)
      Sets the cell of a player
      Constructors in gameStructure with parameters of type Cell 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(java.util.ArrayList<Player> p, Cell[] c)
      Constructor of a Board, it initializes a list of players and a table of cells.
      Player(java.lang.String name, Cell currentCell)
      Constructor of a Player, it creates a Player with a name and a currentCell, both given in parameters
